snippet: A simple storefront in Downtown Brooklyn specializes in Chinese soup dumplings and nostalgia.
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews restaurant Yaso Tangbao in Downtown Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: A simple storefront in Downtown Brooklyn specializes in Chinese soup dumplings and nostalgia.

headline.main: Sauerkraut Rolls and Other Shanghai Surprises at Yaso Tangbao
headline.print_headline: Dumplings and Spring Rolls, Filled With Nostalgia
